price: Ndio kama hivi tunawaelekeza madhaalimu wapendane wao kwa wao kwa sababu ya waliyo kuwa wakiyachuma.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
footnotes: Kama tulivyo wawacha waasi wa kibinaadamu na wa kijini wakistareheshana wao kwa wao, basi amewajaalia madhaalimu wawe ni marafiki wao kwa wao, kwa sababu ya madhambi makubwa wanayo yachuma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
